page.title: 07Maresfield Bonner School
page.content: {Maresfield}school is{111 years old}and was opened in{1874}by the Bishop of Chichester.The schools name came from a Vicar called{Richard Bonner}.Outside they have got a swimming pool,a playground and a field.They have 28 infants and 33 juniors who have 2 playtimes.In the kitchen they have got 2 dinner ladies.In the school 9 people have sandwiches and 52 people have dinners.They have got a Puffin book club but no library.They have got books around the school.These are the after school clubs: Tennis, Net_ball Swimming Computers Recorders Football by Emily and Kathrin.
